location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Burkeh [Barka, Oman] to [James Charles Edwards]

mods.abstract: Letter regarding papers that Colonel Disbrowe has removed from the residency, Pelly's movements around the Gulf in the forthcoming days in preparation of the potential bombing of some Wahabee [Wahhabi] ports and requesting a meeting be arranged with Aboo Esau [Abu Esau] to hear first hand about his travels with [William Gifford] Palgrave.The recipient of this letter, James Charles Edwards, is not named however the incoming letter to this one can be found at Mss Eur F126/44, ff 6-7
